actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Mount McKinley National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of specified lands to the Mount McKinley National Park in the State of Alaska. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Mount McKinley National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.
